name: BMP-1
description: Soviet-designed tracked infantry fighting vehicle with 73mm main gun.

name: BMP-2
description: Soviet-designed tracked infantry fighting vehicle with 30mm automatic cannon and 9M113 Konkurs ATGM.

name: BMP-3
description: Russian-designed tracked infantry fighting vehicle with 100mm main gun, 30mm automatic cannon, and 9M120 Ataka ATGM.

name: BMD-4
description: Russian-designed airborne infantry fighting vehicle with 100mm main gun, 30mm automatic cannon, and 9M120 Ataka ATGM.

name: BTR-3
description: Ukrainian-designed wheeled infantry fighting vehicle with 30mm automatic cannon and 9K113 Konkurs ATGM.

name: BTR-4
description: Ukrainian-designed wheeled infantry fighting vehicle with 30mm automatic cannon and 9K135 Kornet ATGM.
